Get paginated list of users with optional role and search filters

400.description: Invalid request body or user already exists

get.description: Get user information and their settings by user ID

Update a user's password by user ID

Generate a new password and send it via email to the user. If email does not exist, returns 404.

post.description: Authenticate user with login (email or username) and password. Returns access and refresh tokens as HTTP-only cookies.
Refresh access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token. Token can be provided in request body or as a cookie.

parameters.description: Refresh token request (optional if using cookie)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or user already exists

post.description: Resend verification email to a user who hasn't verified their email yet.

get.description: Verify user's email using the verification token from the email link. Returns access and refresh tokens as HTTP-only cookies.
Get user profile information (username, email, avatar) for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
